Name: Achedaway
Natural: The Achedaway Cupper offers dynamic cupping with app-controlled suction modes and red light therapy for faster recovery, pain relief, and skin rejuvenation. Ideal for athletes, physiotherapists, and anyone seeking customizable muscle therapy.

Name: Yunmai
Natural: The Yunmai SlimChic massage gun delivers up to 3200 RPM with a compact brushless motor, three speed modes, and one-button control. Weighing just 1.5 lbs, it's perfect for convenient muscle relief at home or on the go.

Name: Medcursor
Natural: The Medcursor Handheld Massage Gun features a quiet brushless motor, 5 speeds (1200–3200 RPM), and 6 interchangeable heads. Compact and easy to use, it’s ideal for deep tissue relief with up to 4.5 hours of battery life.

Name: TimTam
Natural: The TimTam Pocket PowerMassager offers powerful percussive therapy in a compact size, delivering high-performance recovery anywhere. Designed for portability, it’s perfect for athletes and fitness enthusiasts on the move.

Name: Opove
Natural: The Opove M3 Pro delivers 12mm amplitude and up to 70lbs of stall force with 5 speed settings. Praised for quiet, deep-tissue massage, it's ideal for athletes needing powerful, long-lasting muscle recovery.

Name: Renpho
Natural: The R3 Active Massage Gun offers 5 speeds, 50lbs of stall force, and 5 head attachments with a 2500mAh battery. USB charging and quiet operation make it great for targeted recovery at home, work, or the gym.

Name: Hyperice
Natural: The Hyperice Hypervolt 2 delivers quiet percussive therapy with 3 speeds and 5 attachments in a sleek, portable design. Perfect for athletes seeking muscle recovery, flexibility, and high-performance relief on the go.

Name: Therabody
Natural: The Therabody Theragun Prime provides 16mm amplitude deep-tissue massage with 5 speeds, 4 attachments, and Bluetooth app guidance. Its ergonomic triangle grip and powerful motor make it ideal for full-body recovery and pain relief.
